entries.description: Amazon Q /dev: include telemetry for workspace usage when generating new files
Amazon Q extension may fail to start if AWS Toolkit extension fails to start
Amazon Q Feature Dev: Add error messages when the upload URL expires
Amazon Q (/dev): view diffs of previous /dev iterations
Q dev handle no change required
The next release of this extension will require VS Code 1.83.0 or newer.
Automatically pause and resume @workspace indexing when OS CPU load is high
Add buttons to code blocks to view and accept diffs.
Inline completion for more json files, and all yaml files
Show a one-time warning if new VS Code is required
Minimum required VSCode version is now 1.83
